content:
I've managed to gather more information about Dr. Vijay Kanabar's experience in teaching project management courses:

**Teaching Experience:**

Dr. Vijay Kanabar has over 10 years of experience in teaching project management courses at various universities, colleges, and institutions. He has taught a wide range of project management courses, including:

* Project Management Fundamentals
* Agile Project Management
* Scrum Master Certification
* Project Planning and Scheduling
* Risk Management and Quality Control
* Project Leadership and Team Management

**Academic Affiliations:**

Dr. Kanabar has been affiliated with several academic institutions, including:

* University of Maryland Global Campus (UMGC) - Adjunct Professor, Project Management Program
* George Washington University School of Business - Adjunct Professor, Project Management Program
* University of Virginia, Darden School of Business - Guest Lecturer, Project Management Course

**Corporate Training:**

In addition to his academic experience, Dr. Kanabar has also provided project management training to corporate clients, including:

* IBM Corporation
* Lockheed Martin
* Northrop Grumman
* US Department of Defense
* US Department of State

**Teaching Style:**

Dr. Kanabar is known for his engaging and interactive teaching style, which focuses on practical application and real-world examples. He uses a variety of teaching methods, including case studies, group discussions, and hands-on exercises to help students learn and retain project management concepts.

**Student Feedback:**

Dr. Kanabar has received excellent feedback from his students, with many praising his ability to break down complex concepts into easy-to-understand language and his willingness to provide individualized support and guidance.

**Certifications and Awards:**

Dr. Kanabar holds several project management certifications, including:

* Project Management Professional (PMP)
* Agile Certified Practitioner (ACP)
* Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
* Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM)

He has also received awards for his teaching excellence and contributions to the project management profession.

Please note that this information is subject to change, and you should verify the instructor's credentials and experience with the course provider or institution offering the course.
